City Council
============

Sachse's Vision
---------------

### *Sachse is a vibrant community that offers exceptional**opportunities for all to live, work, and play.*

Meetings
--------

* 6:30 p.m. the first and third Monday of each month
* Sachse City Hall  
  Council Chambers  
  3815 Sachse Rd., Building B  
  Sachse, TX 75048

[City Council Regular Meeting 2026 Calendar](https://www.cityofsachse.com/DocumentCenter/View/12256/Council-Meeting-Calendar_2026)  
*The regular schedule of 2026 meetings for the Sachse City Council. Adjustments may be made as necessary throughout the year.*

**Sachse's Form of Government**
-------------------------------

**Sachse operates under the council-manager form of government. Under this plan, the qualified voters of the city elect a City Council which, in turn, hires a [City Manager](http://tx-sachse2.civicplus.com/257/City-Managers-Office "City Manager") to administer the city's day-to-day operations. The Sachse City Council is composed of seven members: six Councilmembers (Places 1 through 6) and the Mayor. Councilmembers are elected at-large, representing the entire city, and serve three-year terms. N****o person shall serve more than three consecutive terms in a given position.** **The uniform Election Day for the City of Sachse is the first Saturday in May.**

Rules of Order and Procedure
----------------------------

At the August 5, 2024, Council meeting, the City Council Rules of Order and Procedure were adopted by Resolution No. R-2024-05. You may review the [Council Rules of Order and Procedure here](https://www.cityofsachse.com/Archive.aspx?ADID=4572).
